fields.name: Cash
fields.description: The primary account for operating activites. Used to deposit revenue and pay expenses

fields.name: Trade Payables
fields.description: Tracks the money the organization owes its vendors, suppliers consultants and the like. The payments must be made in less than a year.

fields.name: Purchases
fields.description: Relates to purchases the business intends to sell

fields.name: Trade Receivables
fields.description: Tracks purchases made by customers on store credit, not purchases made with credit cards.

fields.name: Retained Earnings
fields.description: Tracks the cumulative profits or losses made by the organization since its formation. Adjusted once every financial year-end.

fields.name: Sales Revenue
fields.description: Tracks the all the money earned selling company goods and services

fields.name: Cash in Savings
fields.description: The account for surplus cash, that is cash with no immediate plans in an account that can accrue interest.

fields.name: Cash on Hand
fields.description: Tracks cash stored at the location of business such as petty cash and in cash registers.

fields.name: Land
fields.description: Tracks the land owned by the organization, bsaed on the cost of purchase.

fields.name: Buildings
fields.description: Tracks any buildings owned by the business based on cost of purchase.

fields.name: Accumulated Depreciation - Buildings
fields.description: Tracks the accumulated depreciation of a building over its lifespan

fields.name: Leasehold Improvements
fields.description: Tracks the value of improvements made on a facility that a business leases instead of purchases.

fields.name: Vehicles
fields.description: Any Vehicles owned by the business. Initial value listed on the this account

fields.name: Accumulated Depreciation - Vehicles
fields.description: Depreciation of any vehicles owned by the organization.

fields.name: Furniture and Fixtures
fields.description: Tracks any furniture and fixtures purchased for use by the business.

fields.name: Accumulated Depreciation - Furniture and Fixtures
fields.description: Tracks any Depreciation on furniture and fixtures

fields.name: Equipment
fields.description: Equipment Purchased for the business for use of more than one year, such as computers tools and cash registers. Value determined by the cost of purchase.

fields.name: Accumulated Depreciation - Equipment
fields.description: Tracks any buildings owned by the business based on cost of purchase.

fields.name: Other Assets
fields.description: Any other assets of small financial value that do not fall in the categories enumerated

fields.name: VAT Control Account
fields.description: Taxes paid to the government on sales made.

fields.name: Accrued Payroll Taxes
fields.description: Payroll taxes paid to the government such as PAYE and NSSA.

fields.name: Short Term Credit Payable
fields.description: Tracks all short term credit(less than one year) the business is liable for.

fields.name: Loans Payable
fields.description: Tracks any long term loans taken out by the organization such as mortgages

fields.name: Notes Payable
fields.description: Tracks money borrowed from other businesses in the form of notes, which are lines of credit that are extended without collateral

fields.name: Other Liabilities
fields.description: Tracks liabilities not covered by the categories provided

fields.name: Common Stock
fields.description: Tracks the value of the outstanding shares of stock sold to investors. Used by corporations only.

fields.name: Capital
fields.description: Tracks money injected into the business during startup and shortly after. Includes contributions such as property and equipment. May have several such accounts for each primary investor. Only used for unincorporated businesses

fields.name: Drawing
fields.description: Tracks any money taken out of an organization by the business owner. If multiple owners are present, multiple drawing accounts are required

fields.name: Sales Discounts
fields.description: Tracks any reductions in full price of merchandise

fields.name: Sales Returns
fields.description: Tracks all transactions related to sales returns of products.

fields.name: Other Income
fields.description: Non traditional revenue streams are recorded here.

fields.name: Interest Income
fields.description: Money earned in interest by the organizations savings accounts

fields.name: Sale of fixed assets
fields.description: Tracks money earned by the sale of fixed assets such as vehicles.

fields.name: Purchase Discount
fields.description: Records discounts received from vendors.

fields.name: Purchase Returns
fields.description: Relates to products returned to suppliers for stated reasons

fields.name: Carriage Inwards
fields.description: Shipping costs accompying the purchase of inventory

fields.name: Other Sales Costs
fields.description: Other Sales Costs that do not fit into the stated categories

fields.name: Sales Commission
fields.description: This represents the percentage of sales earned by sales represetatives as part of their income.

fields.name: Advertising
fields.description: Costs associated with business promotion

fields.name: Bank Service Charges
fields.description: Charges made to the organizations accounts by its bank.

fields.name: Dues and Subscriptions
fields.description: Business club membership expenses and other reccuring subscription costs.

fields.name: Equipment Rental
fields.description: Charges incurred for short term equipment rental.

fields.name: Telephone
fields.description: telephone costs and line rental.

fields.name: Vehicles
fields.description: Costs associated with the operation of company vehicles.

fields.name: Travel and Entertainment
fields.description: Expenses associated with business related travel and entertaiment of clients or suppliers.

fields.name: Supplies
fields.description: Supplies that do not fit in the office supplies account. Small equipment and consumables are recorded here.

fields.name: Salaries and Wages
fields.description: Tracks any money paid to employees as salaries or wages.

fields.name: Rent Expense
fields.description: Cost of renting business premises

fields.name: Payroll Taxes
fields.description: Tracks taxes associated with employee payroll e.g.  PAYE

fields.name: Legal and Accounting
fields.description: Fees paid for legal and accounting consultation.

fields.name: Insurance
fields.description: Cost of buying insurance for the business

fields.name: Office Expenses
fields.description: Tracks items purchased to run an office such as printer toner, etc.

fields.name: Carriage Outwards
fields.description: Includes payments made for shipping of goods to customers.

fields.name: Miscellaneous Expenses
fields.description: Tracks expenses that do not fit into any one of the established expense accounts.

fields.name: Depreciation Expense - Vehicles
fields.description: Records the depreciation on the asset.

fields.name: Depreciation Expense - Buildings
fields.description: Records the depreciation on the asset

fields.name: Depreciation Expense - Furniture and Fixtures
fields.description: Records depreciation on the asset

fields.name: Depreciation Expense- Equipment
fields.description: Records depreciation on the asset

fields.name: Depreciation Expense- Leasehold Improvements
fields.description: Records depreciation on the asset

fields.name: Training
fields.description: Employee training programs

fields.name: Vendor Services
fields.description: Records expenses incurred from vendors such as consultancy and other services
